title: After champ select my League go's tiny HELP!
body:
With this happening I cannot play league and I love this game. So after champ select my loading screen goes tiny then during game its tiny still and I cant play because its so small.
Please help Riot.      {{item:3072}}

replies.body: I'm a little confused about this issue and what you mean by tiny.  Is the resolution just small, or it doesn't show up at all but you can hear sounds?  have you made modifications to your game files?  A screenshot of this could help!  Make sure to double check your resolution setting via in-game video options.  Let me know!
